THE BACK OF MY HAND

AN INTERACTIVE MEMOIR, REFLECTING ON BEING A SECOND-GENERATION INDIAN AMERICAN. 

The Back of My Hand is an experiment in interactive storytelling. It recounts specific memories, and general thoughts that I've had about myself and my racial identity.

Made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
